comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when add filter to a invalid crosstab.

Build number:
2.2.0.v20070608-1028

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the attached design file.
2. Select the crosstab, add filter.

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

Because the attached report design has error in it.
One of the cubeLevels is error.
Now it won't throw exception even if the report has error in it. 
Fixed.
